attributes.action: Remove Starmer and entire cabinet from office. Replace them with capable people
attributes.additional_details: Labour must see that the current ruling element of the party are completely incapable of governing and making decisions that benefit the population and country.  Understandably the current government will resist a general election using the £22 billion black hole as a prerequisite to all answers that ask for an election.  Removal of incompetence is now paramount for this country to thrive.  Thus far everyone has had enough to the degree where protest has become a regularity. They must go asap.
attributes.background: Parliament ought to pressurise the Labour Party to replace Starmer and the cabinet with individuals who are able to bring benefit to the country and the public.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes requests for individuals to be appointed to or removed from office.
